tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    full_name VARCHAR(100),
    dob DATE,
    email VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE retina_scans (
   id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   user_id UUID NOT NULL,
   scan_data BYTEA NOT NULL,
   scan_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE users (
   id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
   created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE permissions (
   id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   user_id UUID NOT NULL,
   role VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
   grant_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE devices (
   id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   serial_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
   purchase_date DATE NOT NULL
)
CREATE TABLE biometric_measurements (id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, measurement_date DATE NOT NULL, measurement_time TIME NOT NULL, retina_image BYTEA);
CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, full_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, username VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL UNIQUE, email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE, password_hash VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE user_roles (role_id INT PRIMARY KEY, role_name VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL UNIQUE);
CREATE TABLE user_permissions (permission_id INT PRIMARY KEY, permission_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE);
CREATE TABLE authentication_logs (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, log_date DATE NOT NULL, log_time TIME NOT NULL, success BOOLEAN NOT NULL);
